about_the_game:
About Who Killed:

Online co-op for 4-8 players where the goal is to discover and eliminate the killer or escape.

Available for PC and Android with simultaneous platforms.

Join the Who Killed community and wishlist the game to stay updated!

Check out the randomly assigned classes below (Note: 1 Killer and 1 Detective per game).

Innocent:

Complete your tasks, and once all innocents finish, a key will be released to escape. If you collect the detective's items, you become the new detective and no longer perform tasks.

Detective:

Patrol the area for clues to discover who the killer is. If you killed by the killer, you'll drop your items for an innocent to pick up and become the new detective.

Killer:

Kill all players to win. You'll have 5 abilities at your disposal to achieve this goal.

Abilities:

Detective: Baton, Gunshots, Motion Sensor, Speed Boost

Killer: Stab, Knife Throw, Bomb, Invisibility, 3 Types of Sabotage

Leveling System:

Every completed match will grant experience based on your actions and class.

Online co-op for 4-8 players where the goal is to discover and eliminate the killer or escape.

Available for PC and Android with simultaneous platforms.

Innocent:

Complete your tasks, and once all innocents finish, a key will be released to escape. If you collect the detective's items, you become the new detective and no longer perform tasks.

Detective:

Patrol the area for clues to discover who the killer is. If you killed by the killer, you'll drop your items for an innocent to pick up and become the new detective.

Kill all players to win. You'll have 5 abilities at your disposal to achieve this goal.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac Os 11
  • Processor: Intel i3-2º
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac Os 14
  • Processor: Intel i3-8º
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Who Killed

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G2020, i3-2º | AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i3-8º | AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Who Killed is a multiplayer murder mystery game that brings a different idea, offering a wide variety of abilities for both classes, where various types of different events can occur throughout the match.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
